name: politico
text: Acting DHS Secretary Chad Wolf went on the defense when asked about the video’s use at the RNC, noting that the department does “hundreds, if not, thousands” of ceremonies like it every year https://t.co/dx5hF3Iog1

name: politico
text: Hawaii’s control of the coronavirus has unraveled this summer, transforming what was the nation’s best-performing state into one of the worst https://t.co/hH9577cCoU

name: politico
text: Senior Republicans are launching a massive new super PAC this week to bolster Donald Trump’s reelection in the final stretch of the campaign — a move that comes as the president has been pummeled by Joe Biden on TV https://t.co/H7VRL0M3K9

name: politico
text: The chaotic scenes in Kenosha, Wis. and Portland, Ore., are redefining the contours of the presidential race https://t.co/SSVRd2kpYQ

name: politico
text:
What are experts saying about Trump's plan for China in a second term? How would Biden's approach differ? For in-depth coverage of the U.S.-China relationship, subscribe to our China Watcher newsletter.
https://t.co/3gr9jzzrQ4 https://t.co/aZnQhZkoDI

name: politico
text: In the nine weeks left in the 2020 campaign, Trump has an especially daunting task: Convince a skeptical American public that the coronavirus-ravaged U.S. economy is actually roaring back https://t.co/mNQyPQocOA

name: politico
text: Coronavirus infections are down in nearly every state. That could either give Trump just what he needs to prime his reelection odds or become another missed opportunity to capitalize on a lull during the pandemic. https://t.co/NATaywUepq

name: politico
text:
There are just over two months left until Election Day — and the past two weeks of conventions tell us a lot about Biden's and Trump's strategies heading into the final stretch.

More with politics editor @PoliticoScott and host @jersiegel on Dispatch
https://t.co/o1yaNayVt7

name: politico
text: Acting Homeland Security Secretary Chad Wolf said Sunday that he did not know a video in which he participated in a naturalization ceremony would be broadcast during the Republican National Convention https://t.co/dx5hF3Iog1

name: politico
text:
Wolf’s comments came after DHS employees received an email Thursday reminding them not to engage in “partisan political activity.”

Subsequent news reports indicated the new citizens also didn’t know their ceremony would be used as part of the convention https://t.co/dx5hF3Iog1

name: politico
text: It’s very possible that a Chinese coronavirus vaccine could be the first to succeed. If Warp Speed contenders fail, the U.S. could be perhaps six to eight months behind in developing one. What happens then? https://t.co/2tcbdYZELd

name: politico
text:
In today's Playbook:

Israeli national security adviser Meir Ben-Shabbat, Jared Kushner and national security adviser Robert O'Brien meet for talks to put final touches on the normalization deal between the UAE and Israel in Tel Aviv, Israel https://t.co/gvCMiOQso6

name: politico
text: Opinion: Vladimir Putin continues to undermine liberal democracy in Europe and beyond. America should not turn its back on that threat. https://t.co/y2SQB0e23i

name: politico
text:
House Minority Whip Steve Scalise defended his decision to tweet a video of a doctored exchange between Joe Biden and progressive health care activist Ady Barkan — insisting that the altered clip correctly conveyed Biden’s stance on police funding 
https://t.co/7T7YAFKWPb

name: politico
text: “Look, it shouldn’t have been edited,” Scalise (R-La.) said. “But at the same time, the comments were always about—in fact, twice in that interview, he asked Joe Biden if he was for redirecting money away from police. And in both times, Joe Biden said yes” https://t.co/7T7YAG2xGJ

name: politico
text: A handful of recent polls show 39-year-old congressman Joe Kennedy trailing incumbent Sen. Ed Markey — the septuagenarian incumbent whose campaign is improbably powered by younger progressive voters https://t.co/WTUOVnvDoX

name: politico
text: President Trump declared he would move ahead with a planned trip to Kenosha, Wisconsin in defiance of the governor's request that he stay away from the state amid raw tensions surrounding protests https://t.co/52lLRLXdIX

name: politico
text:
Unemployment is above 10% and millions of jobs are gone. 

But Trump is trying to convince Americans the economy is roaring back https://t.co/mNQyPQocOA

name: politico
text:
